thread.title: GMG Records steps out with new artistes
thread.title_full: GMG Records steps out with new artistes

author: Okogba
title: GMG Records steps out with new artistes
text:
Home » Entertainment » GMG Records steps out with new artistes GMG Records steps out with new artistes On 1:12 am In Entertainment by Okogba Comments 
BY ROTIMI AGBANA 
Great Masters Generations Record, (GMG), owned by business man Chief Stanley Okoli, was officially launched in Lagos on Sunday January 22, 2017. The label also unveiled the artistes under her management, Famous and Chris. 
According to Maic Fidel, the General Manager of Great Masters Generations Records, the label is here to stay and hopefully will be one of the notable competing record labels in Nigeria. 
He boasted that the label is equipped with all the necessary requirements needed to compete with leading Record Labels in the music industry. Okogba
